module_name: replace with the name of the python module
service: replace with the service it implements
repo_name: replace with the name for the git repo
bug_project: replace with the name of the project on Launchpad or the ID from Github or Gitlab
project_short_description: Boilerplate contains all the boilerplate you need to create an pythonic package.
review_site: Review website, if not provide github or gitlab url
program_name: Entry point name to be called from CLI. This is the name of CLI command
